media.title: C-2300 Block Cutter
media.description: High-precision block cutting machine for granite and marble processing with advanced cutting technology.

media.title: LPM Disk Polishing Machine
media.description:
Advanced disk polishing machine for achieving mirror finish on granite and marble surfaces.
The LPM Disk Polishing Machine delivers exceptional surface finishing with rotating disk technology. Perfect for achieving mirror-like finishes on various stone surfaces.

media.title: LPM Flicker Machine
media.description:
Specialized flicker polishing machine for textured surface finishing on stone materials.
The LPM Flicker Machine creates unique textured finishes on stone surfaces. Ideal for decorative applications and specialized surface treatments.
